properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 7 at 4:01AM AKST until February 9 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Plan on slippery road
conditions. In addition, areas of poor visibility are expected.
Total snow accumulations of 2 to 7 inches are expected.

* WHERE...Eastern Alaska Range.

* WHEN...3 AM Saturday to 3 PM Sunday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 60 mph will cause
areas of blowing and drifting snow reducing the visibility to
one half mile or less at times.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow and blowing snow means periods
of snow and blowing snow will cause travel difficulties. The
latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM SATURDAY TO 3 PM AKST SUNDAY
